name: Can't Stop Won't Stop
description: The duration of the Attacker's Unstoppable effects are increased by {0}, however the Defender takes {1} less Damage unless the Attacker is Unstoppable.

name: Double Down
description: Whenever a Skill Attacker fails to apply a Debuff to the Defender due to an Immunity, they gain a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by +1,433 for 10 second(s).

name: Power Focus
description: The Defender gains {0} Combat Power Rate while below 2 Bars of Power, but suffers {1} Combat Power Rate while above.
